snippet: After a federal judge’s ruling on betting, the N.C.A.A. lifted a recent ban against New Jersey colleges, allowing them to host tournament games or championships.
abstract: NCAA lifts ban against New Jersey colleges, allowing them to host tournament games or championships; move follows permanent injunction in United States District Court barring state from offering sports betting.
lead_paragraph: After a federal judge’s ruling on betting, the N.C.A.A. lifted a recent ban against New Jersey colleges, allowing them to host tournament games or championships.

headline.seo: After Judge’s Ruling on Betting, N.C.A.A. Drops Ban for New Jersey Teams
headline.main: N.C.A.A. Drops Ban of Finals in New Jersey
headline.print_headline: N.C.A.A. Drops Ban of Finals in New Jersey
